# httpBody

**Instance Property**

The request body.

## Declaration

```swift
var httpBody: Data? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The request body is sent as the message body of the request, as in an HTTP `POST` request. Setting the HTTP body data clears any input stream in [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSMutableURLRequest/httpBodyStream]. These values are mutually exclusive.

## Accessing request components

- **httpMethod**: The HTTP request method.
- **url**: The URL being requested.
- **httpBodyStream**: The request body as an input stream.
- **mainDocumentURL**: The main document URL.
